message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to both of us, and I believe it could greatly benefit you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. Let me know if this works for you!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand your perspective, Bob. I'm glad we're discussing this. I'd like to counter your offer with $105 for the product. This is my best offer, considering its value to both of us.
I appreciate your previous offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $102. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your previous offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $96. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
After careful consideration, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $100. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your previous offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $94. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $98. This is my final offer.
